casebody.data:
Daniel HANEY, Appellant
v.
PORTFOLIO RECOVERY ASSOCIATES, L.L.C. and Gamache & Myers, P.C., Appellees No: 15-1932 United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit. December 27, 2016 Jeremy A. Gogel, THE GOGEL LAW FIRM, Saint Louis, MO, for Plaintiff-Appellant. Joshua C. Dickinson, Shilee T. Mullin, SPENCER & FANE, Omaha, NE, Patrick Thomas McLaughlin, SPENCER & FANE, Saint Louis, MO, for Defendant-Appellee Portfolio Recovery Associates, L.L.C. Donald A. Horowitz, GAMACHE & MYERS, Saint Louis, MO, for Gamache & Myers, P.C.

ORDER

In response to the petition for rehearing filed October 19, 2016, the opinion filed September 21, 2016, is vacated and an amended opinion is substituted and filed. The petition for panel rehearing is otherwise denied.

The petition for en banc rehearing is denied as moot.
